verses.verse: And thou shalt make <WH6213> <WH853> an altar <WH4196> of shittim <WH7848> wood, <WH6086> five <WH2568> cubits <WH520> long, <WH753> and five <WH2568> cubits <WH520> broad; <WH7341> the altar <WH4196> shall be <WH1961> foursquare: <WH7251> and the height <WH6967> thereof shall be three <WH7969> cubits. <WH520>

And thou shalt make <WH6213> the horns <WH7161> of it upon <WH5921> the four <WH702> corners <WH6438> thereof: his horns <WH7161> shall be <WH1961> of <WH4480> the same: and thou shalt overlay <WH6823> it with brass. <WH5178>

And thou shalt make <WH6213> his pans <WH5518> to receive his ashes, <WH1878> and his shovels, <WH3257> and his basins, <WH4219> and his fleshhooks, <WH4207> and his firepans: <WH4289> all <WH3605> the vessels <WH3627> thereof thou shalt make <WH6213> of brass. <WH5178>

And thou shalt make <WH6213> for it a grate <WH4345> of network <WH4639> <WH7568> of brass; <WH5178> and upon <WH5921> the net <WH7568> shalt thou make <WH6213> four <WH702> brazen <WH5178> rings <WH2885> in <WH5921> the four <WH702> corners <WH7098> thereof.

And thou shalt put <WH5414> it under <WH8478> the compass <WH3749> of the altar <WH4196> beneath, <WH4480> <WH4295> that the net <WH7568> may be <WH1961> even to <WH5704> the midst <WH2677> of the altar. <WH4196>
And thou shalt make <WH6213> staves <WH905> for the altar, <WH4196> staves <WH905> of shittim <WH7848> wood, <WH6086> and overlay <WH6823> them with brass. <WH5178>

And <WH853> the staves <WH905> shall be put <WH935> into the rings, <WH2885> and the staves <WH905> shall be <WH1961> upon <WH5921> the two <WH8147> sides <WH6763> of the altar, <WH4196> to bear <WH5375> it.
Hollow <WH5014> with boards <WH3871> shalt thou make <WH6213> it: as <WH834> it was showed <WH7200> thee in the mount, <WH2022> so <WH3651> shall they make <WH6213> it.

And thou shalt make <WH6213> <WH853> the court <WH2691> of the tabernacle: <WH4908> for the south <WH5045> side <WH6285> southward <WH8486> there shall be hangings <WH7050> for the court <WH2691> of fine twined linen <WH8336> <WH7806> of a hundred <WH3967> cubits <WH520> long <WH753> for one <WH259> side: <WH6285>

And the twenty <WH6242> pillars <WH5982> thereof and their twenty <WH6242> sockets <WH134> shall be of brass; <WH5178> the hooks <WH2053> of the pillars <WH5982> and their fillets <WH2838> shall be of silver. <WH3701>

And likewise <WH3651> for the north <WH6828> side <WH6285> in length <WH753> there shall be hangings <WH7050> of a hundred <WH3967> cubits long, <WH753> and his twenty <WH6242> pillars <WH5982> and their twenty <WH6242> sockets <WH134> of brass; <WH5178> the hooks <WH2053> of the pillars <WH5982> and their fillets <WH2838> of silver. <WH3701>

And for the breadth <WH7341> of the court <WH2691> on the west <WH3220> side <WH6285> shall be hangings <WH7050> of fifty <WH2572> cubits: <WH520> their pillars <WH5982> ten, <WH6235> and their sockets <WH134> ten. <WH6235>
And the breadth <WH7341> of the court <WH2691> on the east <WH6924> side <WH6285> eastward <WH4217> shall be fifty <WH2572> cubits. <WH520>
The hangings <WH7050> of one side <WH3802> of the gate shall be fifteen <WH2568> <WH6240> cubits: <WH520> their pillars <WH5982> three, <WH7969> and their sockets <WH134> three. <WH7969>
And on the other <WH8145> side <WH3802> shall be hangings <WH7050> fifteen <WH2568> <WH6240> cubits: their pillars <WH5982> three, <WH7969> and their sockets <WH134> three. <WH7969>

And for the gate <WH8179> of the court <WH2691> shall be a hanging <WH4539> of twenty <WH6242> cubits, <WH520> of blue, <WH8504> and purple, <WH713> and scarlet, <WH8438> <WH8144> and fine twined linen, <WH8336> <WH7806> wrought with needlework: <WH4639> <WH7551> and their pillars <WH5982> shall be four, <WH702> and their sockets <WH134> four. <WH702>

All <WH3605> the pillars <WH5982> round about <WH5439> the court <WH2691> shall be filleted <WH2836> with silver; <WH3701> their hooks <WH2053> shall be of silver, <WH3701> and their sockets <WH134> of brass. <WH5178>

The length <WH753> of the court <WH2691> shall be a hundred <WH3967> cubits, <WH520> and the breadth <WH7341> fifty every where, <WH2572> <WH2572> and the height <WH6967> five <WH2568> cubits <WH520> of fine twined linen, <WH8336> <WH7806> and their sockets <WH134> of brass. <WH5178>

All <WH3605> the vessels <WH3627> of the tabernacle <WH4908> in all <WH3605> the service <WH5656> thereof, and all <WH3605> the pins <WH3489> thereof, and all <WH3605> the pins <WH3489> of the court, <WH2691> shall be of brass. <WH5178>

And thou <WH859> shalt command <WH6680> <WH853> the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> that they bring <WH3947> <WH413> thee pure <WH2134> oil <WH8081> olive <WH2132> beaten <WH3795> for the light, <WH3974> to cause the lamp <WH5216> to burn <WH5927> always. <WH8548>

In the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150> without <WH4480> <WH2351> the veil, <WH6532> which <WH834> is before <WH5921> the testimony, <WH5715> Aaron <WH175> and his sons <WH1121> shall order <WH6186> it from evening <WH4480> <WH6153> to <WH5704> morning <WH1242> before <WH6440> the LORD: <WH3068> it shall be a statute <WH2708> forever <WH5769> unto their generations <WH1755> on the behalf <WH4480> <WH854> of the children <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>
